pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with the Prime Minister of North Macedonia Zoran Zaev | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with the Prime Minister of North Macedonia Zoran Zaev in advance of the NATO Leaders Meeting.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister Zaev discussed the essential role NATO plays in trans-Atlantic defence and in supporting the rules‑based international order. Prime Minister Trudeau welcomed North Macedonia to the NATO table, and indicated that he looks forward to North Macedonia’s full accession to NATO.

The two leaders discussed bilateral economic relations, including opportunities to increase investments between the two countries.
